comments: Sangat enjoy nginap di aston ..

Pertama datang saat check in sempat menjadi hal yang mengesalkan, karena staf di receiptionist mengatakan bahwa di sistem mereka hanya ada 2 kamar yang di-booking, sedangkan kami sebenarnya pesan 3 kamar. Saat kami menunjukkan bukti konfirmasi pemesanan yang menurut kami sudah sangat jelas, masih saja staf tersebut berbelit dengan mengatakan saya keliru melakukan booking, yang masuk di sistem hanya 2, sambil menawarkan kami pesan 1 kamar tambahan yang diinginkan dengan harga saat itu yang jelas jauh lebih tinggi di hari raya Lebaran. Hal ini akhirnya sempat membuat kami marah, sudah lelah dengan perjalanan jauh, kemudian proses check in berbelit hingga hampir 1 jam. Akhirnya ada satu staf lain yang meminta maaf dan menyampaikan mereka keliru melihat di sistemnya, intinya pesanan kami saat itu ada lengkap 3 kamar. Alasan yang untuk kami sebenarnya kurang masuk akal.
Sebenarnya secara keseluruhan menginap di sini menyenangkan. Kamar yang cukup luas, nyaman dan bersih. Fasilitas toileteries yang lengkap dan memiliki khas, sangat menyenangkan. Koneksi wifi lancar baik di kamar ataupun di area publik, makanan yang cukup lezat dan bervariasi, serta lokasi yang strategis di tengah kota tetapi tidak terlalu dekat dengan Malioboro yang terlalu padat dan ramai, mudah untuk menuju ke berbagai arah tujuan jika Anda menginap di sini. Di sekitar Hotel pun sangat mudah untuk menemukan berbagai macam kebutuhan.

We had a business trip and stay at this hotel. The hotel is situated at main road and strategic location that has easy access to a good local restaurant such as Gudeg Sagan. When we arrived, we had been greeted warmly with the polite and nice staff in the lobby of the hotel. We're pleased with the service. The room is quite large and clean. The things that I like the most is the selection of the breakfast that serve a variety of international and local food. The kind of breakfast that I cannot find in similar level of hotel. they serve even roast beef and mix your own juice which is fantastic for breakfast. With the relative affordable price, the hotel provides a great service, good atmosphere and great breakfast. So will definitely go back again next time.

Lokasi sangat strategis, sehingga biaya transportasi minimal. Bisa kuliner makanan khas Yogya saat malam hari di seberang hotel.
Kondisi kamar nyaman, cukup luas, tidak berisik saat beristirahat.
Kami sangat menyukai suasananya.
Close to the center of the city, clean room, nice staff
Enak, hotel bersih
I am satisffied with this hotel, strategic location, and comfortable
Hotel is really nice with friendly staff. The breakfast was not great but acceptable.
. Staff very friendly and helpful, Services was excellent.

Nice large room but too little light, and with stains on the carpet and upholstery. Shower floor slippery when wet. Breakfast OK except we were told 30-minute wait for the "famous croissants".. The pool is small. Lovely staff.
The staff was great. Breakfast included was excellent. Best croissants in Asia. Best deal for clean hotel in Yogyakarta. Fairly close to airport.
Good

Check in and check out was really smooth. Room was really clean and comfortable. Staff were also helpful and friendly. Close to amenities. Breakfast buffet was plentiful and good. Really loved my stay here.
highly recommended .  free breakfast
Very clean and new. Excellent staff who were welcoming. Great steakhouse as well.
Staffs are very friendly and hotel well maintained.
Good food in the restaurant. Perfect place to stay in town.
What an amazing place. The breakfast was to die for. Service was also amazing. Room service was great too. No complaints!
Enjoyable stay.
Need to improve the bed quality
Amazing staff, fantastic buffet breakfast. Would definitely stay here again. The adjoining rooms were perfect for our kids and us.

You can tell a good property by the first impression. Hotel is very clean. Staff is polite and food is good. The pool small and the views for some part of the hotel is not great. But otherwise, its a more than pleasant stay for my family and I.
Very comfort and spacious room. Staff are eager to please.
The staff is very helpful! The rooms are spacious and clean.

Very pleasant and clean hotel. Staff is polite and helpful, check in and check out process is very fast. Breakfast is good with variety of food. However, have to improve on water pressure in the shower and the wall between room is thin, can hear conversation from the adjacent room.

Overall, good hotel to stay in yogjakarta. Will be staying here for next trip to yogjakarta.

This was a nice property with excellent staff. The bed was comfortable, the room was clean and it was nice & quiet. The location worked for me because it was not far from the university but there is not much of interest in the surrounding blocks (fabric stores & not much to eat). The food was ok, not great and as expected with much hotel food, overpriced. The spa service were great although the pool was small. I’d stay again, as it was a good value for the money.

Room is specious but the shower room there is only a shower rain that I not really like it. The position of tissue hanger is difficult to use.We got only one body towel, no handkerchief and hand towel.
Hotel is good. However, the hotel discriminate smokers.
Great Breakfast.  Pool area run down.  Room fine. Quite a walk to get anywhere.
The service is excellent and the area is just perfect to walk around, very close to the airport . Absolutely will come back to stay again for the next trip

Great room, lovely hotel and staff. Breakfast was good, lots of options. Service was not great. Took ages for food to come and often cold, in couple of restaurants we tried. More staff than guests. Pool area good.
Area around hotel was not great.

Lovely hotel
Very elegant rooms nice
Great wifi very fast 
Comfortable beds and great service
Front desk staff very fast for my check in
The only item that needs improvement is the breakfast most items cold and no western selection of food for western guests 
I could not eat breakfast only fruit and bread
Which was not fresh the French bread was stale many days old 
Please could you change this and add some western food for breakfast 
Everything else was great and to a high standard including welcome drink and cake 
I will be returning to your hotel 
As I stay in Aston hotels every week.
Hotel charged me 200 thousand rupiah for cleaning fee for a coffee stain claiming they want to buy cleaning products a 5 star hotel doesn't have cleaning products!
A genuine five star hotel. If you are planning a stay in Jogjakarta you can't go wrong with Grand Aston.
Staff was extremely kind and respectful. Perhaps the pool was the weakest point: Sun is blocked most of the day because of the hotel itself. Gym fairly small. Very good breakfast and food in general.

The check-in and check-out were fast and easy. The service was good and the staff was friendly. Location was strategic. The room was nice and clean with comfy bed and pillows. The parking was free! We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. I highly recommend it.
Amazingly helpful staff. Great service and food range. Prices are very cheap for a hotel of this rating. Beautiful stay!
The hotel is way above my expectation from A to Z.  Clean, comfortable, friendly, and excellent breakfast buffet.  I'll definitely come back to this hotel in future visit.
Reserved a big bed but ended up with 2 beds in the room.  Very disappointed

The hotel was very clean, staff was friendly and helpful. Location is not very central regarding restaurants and sightseeing, but Grab works just fine (though 20 minutes from the airport). I would stay again there.
Nice hotel near airport.  It locate right next to a big local mall.  Staffs are friendly and helpful.  Will stay there again.
Very Pleasant hotel.  Size of the hotel means there is still the personal attention.
Satisfying only one bad experience. Someone smoking in the male locked toilet near sauna room.
Very hotel and very good, efficient staff they have. Specially their room service is quick.
very friendly and helpful staff. food is tastey and moderately priced.
Friendly staff and rovide good service
Check-in and check-out process rather slow.
Perfect place to stay. Everything you need.

The hotel is alright for the price, but location is terrible, away from all attractions and it is hard going back to coz cabbies don’t know it.
It is also very noisy because of traffic, the mosque nearby and the a/c.
Breakfast is not good quality.
Easy to get around the city from here. Big supermarket just across the road and the restaurants in the hotel serve very decent food.

We stayed for 5 nights, pleased with the staff services and a well maintained hotel. Closed to most of the things like mall & eateries, overall Jogja is a very nice city to travel which still considerably affordable.
Nice hotel close to the basic amenities and  batik shopping area
Amazing stay. Clean, modern, great food and service

Enjoyed out stay... 
Excellent service and very friendly staff..
Great location.
Great hotel excellent breakfast and lovely rooftop restaurant
excellent hotel and service staffs esp RECEPTION nATALIE AND THE TALL LADY AT RECEPTION TOO
Hotel only have 2 lifts. Once 1 was down for maintenance the other one get very busy. Waiting is longer.
the best accommodation in yogyakarta for me so far! reception is sooo very helpful in assisting us in all our request.
Nice to stay, clean & quiet. Everything is good. Staff so friendly & good service.
Great Place View is not great

Nice and friendly staff front desk staff. Cosy and clean environment 
Buffet breakfast spread - not much of choices. 

Ordered "medium" cooked steak but received at "well done" cooked steak :(
comfort and good service
Good location as it is situated near to the airport, shops/shopping mall & Malioboro.

The hotel staffs were great! However, checked in with missing towels and a hair dryer. The amenities provided could be further improved in terms of quality and functionality. If you are someone who is not so particular, it was a pretty clean and had a pleasant stay.

Super comfortable beds and awesome service .
The staff were helpful and polite at all times

We had a fabulous stay in this hotel, living up to its name of a five star hotel. Great hospitality and its spa service was indulging. Loved the facial which left a glow on my face like never before! Definitely come back for Grand Aston if I ever return to Jogja!
Very nice stay, very nice hotel
Great hotel. Exceeded all expectations, all staff were extremely nice and helpful. Seems like a relatively new hotel so everything is in great condition.

Comfortable bed, clean rooms. The staff is friendly. I reached 2 hours before check in time and they were flexible with that.
The breakfast was amazing with variety of options to choose from
Many shops, restaurants nearby. Also just few meters from lippo mall and cinema 21

Beautiful hotel. Excellent service always with a smile. Breakfast spread excellent. Hotel staff attentive and very polite. Our group enjoyed our stay here and felt very welcome. Would highly recommend to stay. Galaria Mall is just 2 mins away.
In a ‘messy’ traffic city this hotel will be a great location for getting in and out of the city and near by all kind of foods
Nice hotel & polite staff.. hotel are in good condition. Breakfast are good too.. sure will come back

Lovely stay - great decor and service, lots of attention to detail. Good value cheap 5 star - good facilities. Pool is a bit standard and gym is small but fully functional. In the middle of a busy ish area although not so much for tourists within walking distance.  Close to the famous Galleria mall - 2 mins walking.  Huge breakfast spread including lots of local varieties as well as continental. Many rooms may not have much of a view. Seems to be catering for an upmarket local (Indonesian) clientele - most staff still spoke some English. Recommended.
For business hotel is OK, not really comfortable for family or vacation
Everything is fantastic
The room is stinky and not fresh. Wifi extremely  slow
best place in yogakarta as location goes we had great facilities and great service
comfortable and practical.  hotel is in good condition and clean.  reasonably central location.  staff are attentive and helpful.

It was very comfortable. Easy access to places around. Food at Saffron was delicious. Lounge operation time to short, I mean close too early. Should at least be until 2 am. Service was superb. Will like to stay at Grand Aston on my next visit.
Great hotel, Friendly staff & staff can remember my name when they addressed. Very impressed.
Good service and a pleasant stay
Easy access and lies at city center. Near of shops and good choices of food. Good maintained hotel and quite clean.
Amazing!!!

Booking this hotel is simply amazing 
Money worth every penny spent 
Food up to standard and I have high standard 
Won't be disappointed

Excellent hotel. Amazing hospitality; good breakfast lay; they pack breakfast if you want to catch an early morning flight. Rooms are excellent; staff is courteous. Basically easily one of the best hotel experiences I have had.

Air didalam bathroom warnanya sedikit Kuning, jadi kurang nyaman untuk digunakan. Saya sudah laporkan ke petugas reception.

Bathroom cleanliness kurang bersih..

Ada noises sekitar hotel rooms seperti ada maintenance dan sangat Keras suaranya.

they missed  pickup at the airport almost 1hrs which I have to waited . The ast manager ibu Ninik said there was system glitch but other staff said their reservation side was forgot to plugged in the request which made me confused  , as compensation for the mistakes they waived mytransport bills and give free breakfast for the  1st day for both our rooms which I really appreciated.

Thanks to bu ninik and mas dedek for the service and they are very friendly.

ジョグジャカルタは仕事の関係で頻繁に行くのですが、いつもここです。コスパも悪くありません。朝食も充分。バスローブもあるしエアコンはoffに出来ます。NHKワールドも見れるし、スパやルーフトップにレストラン もあります。リゾートホテルを希望されるなら違いますが程よいシティホテルならここです。これまで空港からも比較的近くだったのですが、ジョグジャカルタ空港の移転に伴い市内のホテルまでめちゃくちゃ遠くなるのがネックです。
good location,friendly staff, everything is good, we'll  come back again
It was amazing to stay. I had great time
接待處的職員待客有禮及很友善，樂於協助人客解決問題。餐廳寬敞乾淨丶整潔，早餐十分豐富。服務員熱心為人客服務。
The hotel has perfect service. The staff is very helpfull. The lamps in the room were damaged and the refrigirator harly worked. Otherwise everythi g was quite perfect.
Sehr freundliches Personal. Hilfe bei allen keineren Problemen. Sehr gutes Frühstück.

ホテルは部屋はきれいで広々していて良かった
朝食も種類が多種多様で連泊にもあきることはないと思う
ただクラトンなどの観光地には多少距離があり、近くに観光客がはいれそうな飲食店が少ないのはちょっと不便

Sèjour d’une semaine à Yogyakarta en couple 
Hôtel très confortable avec un personnel parfaitement aimable 
Excellent petit déjeuner, très copieux
Belle ambiance en fin de semaine dans le le grill Room adjacent à la salle du petit déjeuner
Nous n’avons pas testé le restaurant gastronomique.
L’hôtel dispose également d’une agence de voyage auprès de laquelle on peut organiser différentes visites
Good facilities and staff.
施設は綺麗だった。プールの水がやや濁っていた。
使いやすい配置、広さも十分

ホテルスタッフの方の対応がとても良くて、
朝食のビュッフェも種類が豊富で、
とても快適に滞在することができました。
Nagyon kedves személyzet, fantasztikus ételek, tisztaság, olcsóság!!! Ajánlom mindenkinek!
サービスレベル、施設共に最高のレベルです！言うとすれば水圧が弱いだけです。
部屋にケーキが用意してあったのがよかった。部屋も適度に広く快適であった。ただ、周辺には何もなく交通の便はやや悪い。

ホテル周辺はモールしかないですがプールもあり
部屋も広くリラックス出来ました。
シャワーの排水だけ良くなかったです。
他は快適な部屋でした。
Très bon hôtel, le petit déjeuner est très varié, il y a beaucoup de choix. Le centre ville n'est pas très loin, il faut compter 2 ou 3 euros en taxi  avec l'application Grab.

Goede service door de medewerkers daar. Je voelt je echt te gast. De fitnessruimte was echt tof. Heb daar lekker getraind met de fitnessbegeleider daar.  Ook het ontbijt is er prima. Wel wat weinig broodkeuze voor de Europeaan maar voldoende eten. Minder mooi was dat de kraan Canadese douche niet goed werkte. Dit werdt na het melden wel direct op gelost.
同事懂英語主動，房間設備齊全，有齊地道及西方美食，附近有大型超市及百貨公司。

フロントの方の対応が非常にフレンドリーだった。
空港でのピックアップをメールで依頼したら、すぐに返信があり対応が丁寧だった。朝食は評判通り美味しかったです。
快適なホテルです。部屋も比較的広く、朝食もおいしかったです。近くにスーパーもあり、おしゃれなかばん屋さんがありました。

部屋のドアの立て付けが悪く、閉まりにくかった。
シャワーヘッドのホースに亀裂が入っていた。
シャワー室の水捌けが悪かった。
部屋以外の施設はよかった。
ジョグジャでの滞在はここと決めています。最高です！
Gutes Preisniveau, sehr gutes Frühstück, freundliches Personal
Room is ok. Just the coffee cup didn’t clean and restaurant is dark,

This is the third time staying at Grand Aston Yogyakarta but it was a pleasant stay as always. We also used the meeting rooms for our seminar and their service was very nice. Snack were also very tasty!
飯店很棒很乾淨，服務人員態度也非常良好，值得再推薦
Bed and pillow are very comfortable, but a bit disappointed with the toilet. Location in-front of the hotel is always jammed
安くて、綺麗でした。ただ、中心地から少し遠いのでGRAPがないととても不便です
部屋も広くて清潔感があり、周辺にスーパーやモールもあるので便利です。日本語が話せるスタッフもいて安心感があります。
Very good
Good！Good！
シャワーのお湯が出ないことを除けば問題ない
場所も設備も全てが素晴らしい。
Stort rom med kjøleskap og vannkoker, gratis vann på flasker hver dag, stor og god seng, vennlig og hjelptsomt personell, kjempefin og variert frokost

コンパクトで綺麗なホテルです。
朝食ボックスを前夜に頼んだのですが、対応してくれました。美味しかったです。
朝食ビュッフェも美味しいですし、最上階のディナーも素晴らしかったです。
プールは小さめで、少し寒かったです。

It was my second stay here, 10 days this time, and it was close to perfect. I thoroughly enjoyed the breakfast in the small but sophisticated garden.
Please keep the cheese selection and do Avocado-corner more often :)
Mango and Dragonfruit would add to the perfection.
Very small room for improvement: the small fridges in the room should be renewed as their temperature oscillates between +4C and +15C, not good if you want to keep some of your own  stuff reliably fresh

Eine großartige Wahl! Ein wunderschönes Hotel, zu einem unschlagbaren Preis gebucht, und ein Servicepersonal, das selbst in einem ohnehin freundlichen und servicebereiten Land wie Indonesien heraussticht. Zur Maliboro-Straße fährt man besser mit dem Taxi, dennoch ist die Lage in der Solo-Straße sehr gut. Es hat uns prima gefallen!
위생 청결함 식사 서비스 등 거의 모든 면에서 만족스러웠습니다.
酒店非常好。干净、宽敞、舒适、漂亮，早餐很丰盛，各种类别的早餐都有，而且相比之下价格实惠，是非常棒的选择。
Fijn personeel en heel behulpzaam en belangstellend.
La habitación está amplia y cómoda, el desayuno más o menos. El precio es conveniente

I stayed at this hotel many times during the past two years and they never failed to satisfy my expectation. Working staffs are very kind and helpful and the rooms are clean and well organized. The breakfast they provide is very nice also. Generally, I am very much satisfied and enjoyed my stay.
가격대비 매우 만족!

Very good to stay
breakfast is good

ホテルは部屋も新しく、清潔で毎日の掃除も文句なしでした。部屋の設備は、冷蔵庫あり、バスタブはなし、TVのケーブルテレビはチャンネル数が多く、内容も充実。Wakuwaku Japanも見れる。
ホテルの場所は、電車の駅から少し遠い。近くにコンビニが無いのが、少し不便でした。
시내중심가에 위치해 있어 어디든 이동이 편리했으나 조식이 예상외로 부실했고 욕실에 비치된 샴프 등은 포장이 너무 타이트하게 되어있어 뜯다가 포기하고 비누로만 씻었음.

フレンドリーで、親切なサービス。
いろいろ要求に対応してくれるが、日本語出来るスタッフはいるが英会話できた方がいい。
清潔感あるホテルで、全体的に快適であった。GF（1階）の朝食を食べるレストランで、
夜に食事してみたが、朝よりだいぶん良い味。金額的には日本で食べたら1500円くらいが
1000円くらいで済むという具合である。気付いた点は、別項目に書いた。
ホテル的にどうしようもない課題かもしれないが、場所的な問題がある。
空港からトランスジョグジャでこのホテル付近まで来て、歩いてこのホテルを目指すのは
不可能でないが、車とバイク（スクーター）が非常に多く、歩行者用の信号ないし、横断歩道は滅多にない、歩道はあるが屋台が占拠していて歩きにくい、そんな状況なので、空港-ホテルの往復はタクシーが良いと思われる。トランスジョグジャでマリオボロ通りや王宮へ行くには、ホテルの西側の病院前のバス亭から１Aで。街中から戻るには、１Aに乗り、GUSUMANAGARA Bus Stop で４Bに乗り換え、ホテル東側にあるGARDENER Bus Stopで下車、、ホテル前まで歩いて、車やバイクに気をつけて道を横断してホテル着である。地球の歩き方のインドネシア2017-2018で、地図にあるこのホテルの位置は正確でない。正確にはあと1cmくらい水平に東へ移動させた場所だ。
値段は安かったのですが、ホテルは綺麗で快適でした。スタッフも親切で、レストランのナシゴレンは美味しかったです。中心部から遠いので、タクシーを使う必要があります。帰りにうまくタクシーがつかまえられなかったので、そこは考える必要があると思います。
印尼日惹很熱，逛了一整天，滿身大汗；回到旅館，想泡澡享受一下，可惜旅館內沒有浴缸！且浴室內只有浴巾，沒備洗完手後供擦手用的毛巾，也沒備洗臉用的面巾！旅館buffet餐廳料理多樣化，口味足以刺激味蕾，可惜只提供星期六一晚！旅館外有提供合作的人力三輪車，能提供附近的兜風與夜遊，但需付費，價格並不貴！
Aires communes nombreuses. Déjeuner très varié et excellent. Spa abordable et très bien décoré: à essayer lors de votre séjour :)
Schönes Gebäude. Modern. Sehr nette Mitarbeiter. Frühstück jedoch sehr enttäuschend.  Klima im Zimmer hat nicht richtig funktioniert. Aufzüge fallen ab und zu aus.

新しく、価格の割に非常に快適なホテルでした。バスタブがないのだけがたまに傷。

ホテル内や隣にもレストランがいくつかあり、便利です。特に最上階にあるスペイン料理屋さんはおすすめです。
I stayed at this hotel many times and this hotel always satisfies my expectation. It has a good location and their service is always wonderful with their hospitality.
Sehr schönes Hotel und in der zentralen Lage aber dich sehr ruhig. Das Frühstück ist der Hammer.

マリオボロからは結構離れており、周辺はテキスタイル屋が多いエリア。観光にはやや不便ですが、タクシーを使って観光しようとされている方には良いかも。逆に、トランス・ジョグジャを使って観光しようとされている方は、バス停の丁度中間地点にあるので、暑い中歩くのは結構大変。また、1Aで空港から、またマリオボロへ行くのは良いのですが、空港に行くときは1Aでマリオボロを経由していくので、かなり時間が掛かります。マリオボロから戻る時は途中で乗り換える必要があり、面倒かも。
お部屋は普通ですが、シャワーのみでバスタブはありません。朝食は種類も多く良かったですが、一つ一つの水準が高い訳ではありません。野菜・フルーツでジュースをその場で作ってくれるのは良かったです。

I think it is okay, location is good, very convenient to the airport. Stuffs are nice too. But quit dark inside(like the aisle..) The breakfast is ok. No special except fresh juice(there is a machine there).

仕事で年に2,3回ジョグジャに行きます。グランドアストンは初めてです。3泊4日滞在しました。
スタッフの対応も清潔感も設備も大満足。日本語が達者なスタッフさんもいて、チェックインやチェックアウト、ちょっとした用事は日本語OKです。体調を崩したのですが、とても親切にしていただきました。
お部屋もベッドも広かったです。ベッドは柔らかめ。
ただしシャワーしかないので、長期滞在で湯船がないのは、ちょっとしんどかったです。
プールやジムなどは使っていませんが、次回は使いたいです。
タクシーの手配、荷物預かり、濃やかな気遣いに感謝です。朝食も美味しい。
Great hotel 10 minutes by car to  jalan malioboro. Very good breakfast with a big selection of asian and western food. Small swimming pool. Friendly and helpfull staff.
酒店位置不错，设施也很好，床很舒服。。。

This hotel has five stars in everything.
Quality of the building and furniture and facilities were all perfect
The room was clean and towels and toiltetries (toothbrush, razors..) were replaced every day

Staff always smiling and helping
Many staff people in every corner: porters, receptionists, housekeepers...

Flowers and lounge music 

Good travel agency in the hotel open since 8 am

BEST breakfast ever! The restaurant has a nice big dining area and in the morning it's full of good fresh food from all over the world (italian coffee and cornetto, french patisserie, indonesian, japanese, chinese, american...).

The only thing that I would improve is the SPA staff, only one terapist available at a time and the pool is not in a sunny area so water was cold.

All the rest was perfect
very kind and helpful staff, excellent breakfast buffet, good shopping nearby.

ボロブドゥール観光のために2泊しました。全体的に清潔でバイキングの朝食も充実していました。スタッフの対応も良かったです。近くの宗教施設の大音量の放送は変な時間に流れるので迷惑ですが、他の東南アジアの国でも経験したので、個人的には仕方ないのかと思いました。
マイナスだったのは洗面台。詰まってしまったので修理を頼みましたが、完全には直らずに夜また詰まってしまいました。
朝ごはんのバイキングの種類の豊富さに驚きました。ロビーもお部屋も綺麗で、二日間の滞在でしたがとてもリラックスできました。また宿泊したいと思います。

The room is clean.The staff are very kind.There is no bathtub.Various amenities are available.The wind of the drier is weak and it is noisy.Both instant coffee and mineral water will be refilled on the second day.There was a big supermarket nearby and it was convenient.This is a good hotel.
